definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

pinyin: yuan2 shi3 re4 dai4 yu3 lin2

sentences.english: You can't be too careful when you visit the rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们要去热带雨林我们不能不特别谨严。

sentences.english: Distributing all over the world intertropical , the selva area with South America is most.
sentences.chinese: 分布在全世界的热带，以南美洲的热带雨林地区最多。

sentences.english: It also confirms the notion that planting more trees in tropical rainforests could help slow global warming worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 而在热带雨林种更多的树则会减缓全球变暖。

sentences.english: Experience the rainforest beauty of Far North Queensland on a scenic day trip from Cairns.
sentences.chinese: 从堪恩斯出发体验昆士兰最北端的热带雨林之美。

sentences.english: Jade vine is native to the Philippines where it grows in tropical rain forests.
sentences.chinese: 绿玉藤原产地在菲律宾的热带雨林中。

sentences.english: The couple drove a truck in the tropical rain forest.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇开着一辆卡车进入了热带雨林。

sentences.english: A rainforest restoration project in southern China is engulfed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 中国南部的归还热带雨林计划遭火海吞没。

sentences.english: Dry and decayed old trees can be seen everywhere in a tropical rain forest.
sentences.chinese: 热带雨林的地面上，到处可见枯朽的老树。

sentences.english: Monkeypox occurs primarily in remote villages in Central and West Africa, near tropical rainforests.
sentences.chinese: 猴痘主要在中非和西非靠近热带雨林的边远村庄发生。

sentences.english: This Amazon River tributary snakes through one of the last tropical rainforests on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 亚马逊河蜿蜒流过地球上最后的热带雨林之一。

sentences.english: Cocoa trees are originally from the rainforests of the Americas.
sentences.chinese: 可可树最初来子美洲的热带雨林中。

sentences.english: Half of all invertebrate species live in tropical rain forests.
sentences.chinese: 一半的无脊椎动物物种生活在热带雨林中。

sentences.english: We need a massive reforestation programme.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有一个大规模的重造热带雨林计划。

sentences.english: What are factories and rainforest burnings doing to our planet?
sentences.chinese: 工厂和热带雨林的燃烧为我们的星球带来了什么？

sentences.english: There is a new species of leopard out there in the rainforest of Borneo.
sentences.chinese: 在婆罗州有一种新的美洲豹在热带雨林中被发现。

sentences.english: Up to a quarter of all the woody growth in some rainforests may be lianas .
sentences.chinese: 在热带雨林中的木本植物近四分之一为藤本植物。

pinyin: yuan2 shi3 re4 dai4 yu3 lin2
Ma3 da2 jia1 si1 jia1 Dao3

definition: old growth forest/primary forest/original forest cover
